snippet: The restaurant Candle 79 was where the psychologist Kelly McGonigal and associates celebrated the publication of “The Willpower Instinct,” her study of self-control.
abstract: Scene at Candle 79, organic vegan restaurant on Upper East Side of Manhattan, described as Stanford University psychologist Kelly McGonigal dines with friends.
lead_paragraph: The restaurant Candle 79 was where the psychologist Kelly McGonigal and associates celebrated the publication of “The Willpower Instinct,” her study of self-control.

headline.seo: At Candle 79, an Organic Vegan Book Party
headline.main: You Say You Made a Resolution
headline.print_headline: You Say You Made a Resolution
